solution_line_template: If Rick bought {rick_guppies} guppies, Tim bought {clowns_per_guppy_ratio} clowns/guppy * {rick_guppies} guppies = <<{clowns_per_guppy_ratio}*{rick_guppies}={tim_clowns}>>{tim_clowns} clowns.
The total number of tetras bought by you is {tetras_per_clown_ratio} tetras/clown * {tim_clowns} clowns = <<{tetras_per_clown_ratio}*{tim_clowns}={my_tetras}>>{my_tetras} tetras
In total, the three bought {my_tetras} tetras + {tim_clowns} clowns + {rick_guppies} guppies = <<{my_tetras}+{tim_clowns}+{rick_guppies}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} animals.
